name: Casino Games
author: Flytonic

sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin folder to /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin from your WordPress dashboard Plugins>Add New.
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. Go to manual odds to add/edit the settings.
  4. Documentation Link: https://www.flytonic.com/free-casino-game-plugin-documentation/
sections.faq:
Something is not working! Is there a quick fix?

Check if the plugin is installed and activated
Make sure you read the documentation(https://www.flytonic.com/free-casino-game-plugin-documentation/) and follow the steps

Can I translate this plugin to my language?

Yes, this plugin is translation ready, .pot file is included in the /languages folder.

How to get access to automated sports betting odds API?

You need to upgrade to Pro version(https://www.flytonic.com/product/casino-review-plugin/) and you can get access to several other features.
sections.changelog:

1.37

  • Compatibility check with latest wordpress version.
sections.description:
The Ultimate Casino Games WordPress Plugin

Description

=
PRO Live Demo
Introducing casino slots, the ultimate casino games WordPress plugin that will take your website to the next level. With manual and inbuilt APIs , you can easily add a variety of popular casino games to your website, such as slots, blackjack, roulette, and more.

This plugin offers a sleek and user-friendly interface that allows your visitors to easily navigate and play their favorite casino games without leaving your site. With customizable settings, you can tailor the plugin to match the look and feel of your website, and even adjust the odds and payouts of the games to your liking.

The plugin also includes advanced features such as manual games, affiliate links and even the ability to offer bonuses and promotions to your players. With these Junctions, you can create a fully immersive online casino experience for your visitors, and potentially increase engagement and revenue on your website.

Don’t miss out on the opportunity to take your website to the next level with casino games and slots plugins , the ultimate casino games WordPress plugin.

  • Tested with Woocommerce version 6.0.0 up to the latest version 7.2.2.
  • This plugin is compatible with PHP 7!

What Does It Do?

You can create your own casino games
Inbuilt 100 Games in the prod
Add your affiliate links to the book maker
create shortcodes to display the games on the website
There is no restrictions on the number of games and shortcodes
Stunning design for your website

What you can do with our PRO version:
You will get access to premium automated APIs for games
Access to pros and cons
Additional features to display games
More shortcodes and layouts

Translation Ready

The plugin is ready to be translated to your local language, .pot file is included in /languages folder.

Support

Please use WordPress.org forum to ask for support, to submit bug reports, to ask questions about the free plugin, or to suggest a new feature.

Only use the contact form on our website if you’re inquiring about the PRO version.
